Traits.Name: Mounted Combat
Traits.Description: An ally smaller than the Misfire Beast can use an action to mount or dismount it. While mounted, the allyâ€™s speed is reduced to 0, moves when the Misfire Beast moves, and gains cover. If the ally is reduced to 0 hp, stunned, or shoved, they are forcibly dismounted and are placed into an adjacent space.

Traits.Name: Wild Beast
Traits.Description: While no character is mounted on the Misfire Beast, it has hatred of the closest character.
